title: The Shoebox Baby Interview: Growing Up in O'Block, NBA Youngboy Beef, King Von & More
description:
Shoebox Baby came outta nowhere with his lit personality, to talk about his music, his come up, his plans, Von, Kodak, Akademiks and much more! https://www.instagram.com/shoeboxbaby64/ --- 0:10 - Adam and Shoebox Baby met in Chicago and happened to be on the same flight to LA together. Someone had a heart attack 5:35 - Chief Keef made O'Block famous, King Von revived it 7:55 - Shoebox says he has no problem with Akademiks. Says he can come to O Block if he wants 11:49 - Started rapping when Von was still alive. Von told him to stop rapping like he’s from Detroit 40:50 - Just recorded a song with PGF Nuk. Polo G cosigning Nuk ----- Shout to our Partners at Gamer Supps!
